title: Full React Project: Production Application
description: Build a complete real-world React application from scratch to deployment

intro.title: From Idea to Product
intro.story: Now you stop building demos. You build real software.
intro.preview: Plan, build, optimize, and deploy a full React app.

refresher.title: What is a Full Project?
refresher.content:
# Full Project Meaning

A full project:

- Solves a real problem
- Has multiple pages
- Uses real data
- Handles errors
- Is deployed online

---

This is how real companies build apps.

concept.title: Example Project Idea
concept.content:
We will think in terms of:

- Authentication
- Dashboard
- CRUD operations
- API integration
- Role-based access

Example:
Job portal, expense tracker, admin system.

concept2.title: Application Architecture
concept2.content:
```
src/
 ├─ components/
 ├─ pages/
 ├─ hooks/
 ├─ context/
 ├─ services/
 ├─ utils/
 ├─ routes/
 ├─ assets/
 └─ App.jsx
```

concept3.title: Data Flow
concept3.content:
User Action ➜ Component

Component ➜ API Call

API ➜ State Update

State ➜ UI Update

positive.title: Service Layer

concept4.title: Authentication Flow
concept4.content:
1. User logs in
2. Token stored safely
3. Protected routes enabled
4. Logout clears session

positive2.title: Protected Route

concept5.title: State Strategy
concept5.content:
Use:
- Local state for UI
- Context or store for global data
- Server as source of truth
